guestnetwork.title: Get access to the UCLL Guest Network
guestnetwork.description: The UCLL Guest Network is a free Wi-Fi network for guests of UCLL. You can use this network to access the internet during your visit.
guestnetwork.smallMessage: Scan QR code to get access to the UCLL Guest Network
guestnetwork.footerMessage: This QR code is valid for 7 days. After that, you will need to scan the QR code again to get access to the UCLL Guest Network.
